alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 17 at 10:05AM PST until November 18 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Strongest wind speeds will be east of Interstate 205 and in the West Hills of the Portland metro area. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
